name: AI-Based Air Quality Monitoring System
desc: An IoT and Machine Learning-based system to monitor real-time air quality and predict Air Quality Index (AQI) using sensor data and ML models.

name: Marketing Campaign Analysis Project
desc: A data analysis project that explores customer demographics, spending behavior, and marketing campaign effectiveness using EDA and visualization to derive insights.

name: Customer Churn Prediction & Retention Analysis
desc: A data science project to predict customer churn using machine learning and provide retention scoring and business insights for improving customer retention strategies.

name: BI Dashboard Projects
desc: A collection of interactive business intelligence dashboards built using popular tools like Power BI to visualize key business metrics and insights across different domains.

name: Netflix Data Analysis Using SQL
desc: A SQL-based data analysis project on Netflix content to explore movies and TV shows by genre, country, release year, ratings, and duration using complex SQL queries.

name: Zomato Data Analysis
desc: A data analysis project that explores and visualizes restaurant and food delivery patterns, ratings, and trends using the Zomato dataset with insights for business and customer behavior.
